inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The randomization and blinding design was developed by a faculty of the Department of Physiology who is not included in the study team.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: All the selected patients will be then requested to come to the Department again on the next day for the HRV test with proper preparation.

exclusion.criterion: Unstable patients with ACO (patients with exacerbation and medication changes in the past 30 days)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: With acute exacerbation of any pulmonary diseases, such as, Bronchial asthma
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
